00015                              int32_t serverPort,
00016                              int32_t serviceId,
00017                              int32_t pingId) :

00030 void
00031 PingArguments::addToArguments(arguments* args)
00032 {
00033     if (args == NULL) {
00034         return;
00035     }
00036     
00037     // Add the address
00038     stringArg serverAddress;
00039     serverAddress.name = "serverAddress";
00040     serverAddress.value = _serverAddress;
00041     args->stringArgs.push_back(serverAddress);
00042     
00043     // Add the service id
00044     i32Arg serviceId;
00045     serviceId.name = "serviceId";
00046     serviceId.value = _serviceId;
00047     args->i32Args.push_back(serviceId);
00048     
00049     // Add the port
00050     i32Arg serverPort;
00051     serverPort.name = "port";
00052     serverPort.value = _port;
00053     args->i32Args.push_back(serverPort);
00054     
00055     i32Arg pingId;
00056     pingId.name = "pingId";
00057     pingId.value = _pingId;
00058     args->i32Args.push_back(pingId);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void
00062 PingArguments::loadFromArguments(arguments args)
00063 {
00064     // Extract the server address
00065     for (int it = 0; it < args.stringArgs.size(); it++) {
00066         if (args.stringArgs[it].name == "serverAddress") {
00067             _serverAddress = args.stringArgs[it].value;
00068             break;
00069         }
00070     }
00071 
00072     // Extract port, server id and ping id information
00073     for (int it = 0; it < args.i32Args.size(); it++) {
00074         if (args.i32Args[it].name == "port") {
00075             _port = args.i32Args[it].value;
00076         } else if (args.i32Args[it].name == "serviceId") {
00077             _serviceId = args.i32Args[it].value;
00078         } else if (args.i32Args[it].name == "pingId") {
00079             _pingId = args.i32Args[it].value;
00080         }
00081 
00082         if (_port != -1 &&
00083             _serviceId != -1 &&
00084             _pingId != -1) {
00085             break;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void
00091 PingArguments::loadServerId(std::vector<Server> serverList)
00092 {
00093     for (int it = 0; it < serverList.size(); it++) {
00094         if (serverList[it].getServerAddress() == _serverAddress &&
00095             serverList[it].getServerPort() == _port) {
00096             _serverId = serverList[it].getServerId();
00097             break;
00098         }
00099     }
00100 }

00103 PingArguments::getServerAddress()

00105     return _serverAddress;
